Package io.micronaut.context

Interface ApplicationContextProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
ApplicationContextLifeCycle<T>, EmbeddedApplication<T>, EmbeddedServer, NettyEmbeddedServer, ServerUnderTest
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractExecutor, AbstractFunctionExecutor, EmbeddedServerUnderTest, FunctionApplication, FunctionInitializer, MessagingApplication, NettyHttpServer, StreamFunctionExecutor
public interface ApplicationContextProvider
An interface for classes that provide an ApplicationContext.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
